title: How Cleveland Browns' Pierre Desir spent his offseason preparing for a challenge like he faces in Peyton Manning
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Starting Blocks - Today 
The second-year cornerback understood this year represented the most crucial in his transition from a small-college player....
